heading: # Bidirectionality (RTL)
headingText: Vuetify supports RTL **(right to left)** languages and can be activated by using the **rtl** option when bootstrapping your application. You can find additional information about [implementing bidrectionality](https://material.io/design/usability/bidirectionality.html) on the specification site.
bidText2: You can also change this dynamically at any point by modifying the **rtl** value on the vuetify object.
